display_name: Overall Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >=2% oxygen desaturation or arousal
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with >=2% oxygen desaturation or arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hremba2 + hroa2 + hnrba2 + hnroa2 + carba2 + caroa2 + canba2 + canoa2 + oarba2 + oaroa2 + oanba2 + oanoa2 ) / slpprdp
